scrollable-tab.config.title: Scrollable Tab Configuration
scrollable-tab.config.scrollbarbg.toolti: The color to use for the background of the scrollbar (scrollbar is only displayed if necessary)
scrollable-tab.config.scrollbarfg.toolti: The color to use for the foreground of the scrollbar (scrollbar is only displayed if necessary)
scrollable-tab.config.maxrows.tooltip: The amount of rows to be rendered in the tab menu
scrollable-tab.config.scrollbarwidth.too: The width, in pixels, of the scrollbar
scrollable-tab.config.scrollbarincr.tool: The amount of players to move over scroll
